alert.note: Alert for Pitt (North Carolina) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Severe Thunderstorm Warning issued July 06 at 9:13PM EDT until July 06 at 9:45PM EDT by NWS Newport/Morehead City
info.description: The National Weather Service in Newport has issued a * Severe Thunderstorm Warning for... Northwestern Pitt County in eastern North Carolina... * Until 945 PM EDT. * At 912 PM EDT, a severe thunderstorm was located 7 miles northwest of Bruce, or 9 miles north of Farmville, moving east at 10 mph. HAZARD...60 mph wind gusts. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Expect damage to roofs, siding, and trees. * Locations impacted include... Greenville, Farmville, Bell Arthur, Bruce, Fountain and Falkland. HAIL THREAT...RADAR INDICATED MAX HAIL SIZE...<.75 IN WIND THREAT...RADAR INDICATED MAX WIND GUST...60 MPH
info.instruction: For your protection move to an interior room on the lowest floor of a building. Please send your reports of hail and/or wind damage, including trees or large limbs downed, by calling the National Weather Service office in Newport at 1-800-889-6889.
